name: Just Roll With It (itch) (Broxxar)
description:
Battle through waves of teeth gnashing poker chips to prove to an enigmatic dog that you are worthy of his praise!

Roll the dice and assign each die to a stat. Wanna shove that nice 6 into damage? Well then be prepared to give up some of your speed or maybe even your max health! 😱

Didn't get a favorable suite of stats? Well... Just Roll With It!
